attributes.review:
I was excited to get this app to find out more about my Wonderful president (🥴🤡), but when I opened the app I was greeted with a pop up add for “Sexxy Blond Bimbos 🍆💦”. I thought to myself for a moment “No way MY president would allow this on his app”, so I continued to scroll onward. 
 It was a few minutes later, I had already nearly forgotten about the first incident, when yet ANOTHER pop up ad came about announcing “FREE feet pics ALL THE TIME!”. I was apalled. 
 It didn’t end there, though! One after the other, more and more pop up ads for various kinds of... of p*rn kept coming onto my screen—no pun intended. 
 I truly hope Donald thinks about his actions.
attributes.title: Bug/Viruses?

attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: Before I downloaded this horrid app my life was perfectly normal btw... I was having a great day when I decided to download this app to get my daily dose of politics. As soon as I opened the app it asked me to confirm my location. I was a little confused but I still agreed. As soon as I pressed the button a big Cheeto man burst through my front door with 2 beefy men at his side💀 I was then dragged out of my own home and thrown into the back of a truck. It’s been 30 days in this stinky basement and I’m with some children the orange has also kidnapped. I am being forced to serve this creature Diet Coke and McDonalds. I would never get this app. It’s not funky nor fresh.✨🧚🏻0/10🧚🏻✨🍊
attributes.title: no🙈😝❤️

attributes.review: anybody else’s phone crash every single time you open the app? and then once it finally loaded it asked you to do “challenges” and threatened to expose your information if you didn’t comply? anybody else asked for their social security number, address, names and numbers of any family members and your credit card information? reminds me a lot of the blue whale game that went around a few years ago! absolutely terrified, i cried for weeks for my family’s safety but the worst part was the picture of a nude man getting a spray tan with a croissant in between his legs that filled the background of the app. heartbreaking. do not download.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: Wish I could rate less than 1 star. First, the app installed itself on my phone but then promised it would build a wall around my phone to keep other phones out. I’m not sure what that was supposed to mean. The app also promised to be the best app ever, better than anything from China. But then I found out that it’s just huge, and it’s also somehow friends with Russia? How does that help me? It promised 4 minutes of amazing app usage, but all I’ve seen is 3 and a half minutes of empty promises, slander, racism, and forcibly deleting other apps from my phone. I’m not sure it even has the authority to do that, but it did... SAD!
attributes.title: Where do I even begin?

attributes.review: first off, i opened the app to see this fat cheeto puff with a wig on holding his fist up. i felt very violated and felt as if he was going to hit me 🥺. when i showed my mom she started to cry because she told me that she has seen that monster in her nightmares. when i found of that that annoying orange was running for president i began running too.. running away from america. this man will not make america better again, he plans on making all americans get spray tans likes him 🥺. also i heard he’s a murderer, he killed one of iran’s best fights and almost started WORLD WAR 3. let’s work together to get this man taken down. THE RISE OF THE TIKTOKERS AND THE FALL OF THE ORANGES!! thank you
attributes.title: this app... just a no

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to hail our racist orange king but it was truly a disaster from the beginning. It took 69 hours to even download, and as soon as I even opened the app, it glitched to distorted pictures of the kings face edited on to monkey butts. Me and my whole family were greatly disturbed. Especially my poor Mimi and Pöo Pöo.
They were very upset to see the spray tan man being exploited for what he really is. This app also played awful music which lured many wild animals and bugs into my home and ate our house. Our house then collapsed and KILLED MIMI AND PÖO PÖO!!!! 😡😡😡😡 I simply cannot support a grandparent killer!! I expect Donald to pay for the sacrifice we will be offering at their funeral! Mimi and Pöo Pöo forever!!!
attributes.title: GROSS

attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch and start acting up so bad. It was the worst, if i could give it 0 starts then i absolutely would!! And for some reason there were so many ads it wanted to make me throw up!! ✨when i first opened the app it was a black screen and it was like that for about 1 minute straight, then Trumps face popped up and i got a very startled🧚‍♀️✨ eventually i bought some tickets to go to a couple of his events but then i realized i couldnt go because i had to water my pool🙈. Anyways this app is the worst and i hate it because it do be trippin a lot👅🤪. Live in Spain without the S 💙🥰💞🤤🦋🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️✨😳🙈‼️👀🥺😍
attributes.title: This app almost made me have an aneurysm👺

attributes.review: this app had me go through the most terrifying experience of my life. i downloaded it and immediately my phone started heating up and a “scanning all data” message came up trying to hack all my personal information including my credit cards and social security i my phone started burning my hands i threw it in the toilet and it cracked my toilet causing a flood everywhere. all my accounts went to a balance of zero and i’m now on the streets because this app stole all my information destroyed my home and stole my money. do not make the same mistake i did and destroy your life stay away from anything brought by the big fat orange cheeto.
attributes.title: DANGEROUS & HACKING APP

attributes.review: Soooo I was downloading this app because I gotta support ✨🧚‍♀️💓sugar daddy trump🥰✨☺️and as soon as I opened the app my phone got BLOWN UP with adds for tanning salons and these fake tanners and my phone almost blew up because it had so many bugs😔and then don’t even get me started on how all these these messages kept popping up on the app about how to sexual assault women “the trump way”. It was terrible, I’m traumatized for life😭I was just trying to support the ✨🧚‍♀️🥰burnt Cheeto king✨🥰💖but he did me dirty. And he’s not afraid to do the same to you! So please I’m begging you be careful because god only knows what this ✨🧚‍♀️burnt Cheeto💖✨is capable of😭I’m scared for my life.
attributes.title: I almost died from downloading this app.
